case.name: Military Rehabilitation & Compensation Commission v Perry [2007] FCA 1862 (29 November 2007)

citphrases.citphrase: effect of amendment to s 8(9) of safety, rehabilitation and compensation act 1988 (cth)
whether s 8(6) of act continues to apply to commonwealth employee who has ceased to be employed
how s 8(9b) of act applies where injury suffered prior to commencement of subsection
section 8(9b) of act provides for continued application of s 8(6)
amendment has future action on past events and is not retrospective
